meanings.definition: With the mouth open in surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: She stared openmouthedly at the magician's disappearing act.
meanings.sent2: The children gasped openmouthedly at the fireworks display.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tilted its head openmouthedly at the strange noise.
meanings.sent4: The news of the treasure left him openmouthedly speechless.
meanings.sent5: The grand finale of the concert left the audience openmouthedly amazed.
